data.title: The Movie DataBase
data.brief: Looking to watch a movie or tv series and don't know in which platform to stream it? This app is for you. My first React project. It's a Front-End connected to an API that, regarding your IP location will serve you where to watch it.

data.title: Crypto Prode
data.brief: The prode is kind of a fantasy football game, very popular in Argentina. The Crypto Prode was intended as a game to be played during the FIFA World Cup hosted in Qatar. Solution developed in Solidity, contract never left GitHub.

data.title: The HM Project
data.brief: This project is a Node JS app that connects to the Real-Time LinkedIn Scapper API to search and get data jobs posted on LinkedIn that can be filtered by location, company, and job title. Also connected to the OpenAI API in order to apply further filters regarding the title, technologies required and experience and if needed, generate a cover letter for the specific desired job.
